item.moresaddles.iron_saddle.tooltip: A sturdy iron saddle that makes your horse faster and tougher.
item.moresaddles.diamond_saddle.tooltip: A luxurious saddle made of diamonds
item.moresaddles.gold_saddle.tooltip: A shiny golden saddle fit for royalty
item.moresaddles.emerald_saddle.tooltip: An exotic emerald saddle with mystical properties
item.moresaddles.netherite_saddle.toolti: The ultimate saddle forged from netherite
item.moresaddles.jump_saddle.tooltip: Allows your mount to jump higher
item.moresaddles.health_saddle.tooltip: Provides additional health to your mount
item.moresaddles.flying_saddle.tooltip: Grants limited flight to land mounts
